a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent to
which women are free from forced labor, have property rights and access to the justice system, and enjoy
freedoms of movement. The variables ranges from 0 to 1 (most rights).
